title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase and enhance the Hope Scholarship Credit and to repeal the Lifetime Learning Credit.
content: Personal Access to Continued Education Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) repeal the Lifetime Learning Credit, (2) make the Hope Credit refundable, (3) increase the Hope Credit. (4) specify that such credit shall not be reduced by either Pell grants or supplemental educational opportunity grants. And (5) allow additional qualifying expenses for such credit, including job skills courses.
